Articles.Content:
Issue & Explanation:

Whenever trying to launch the game I get stuck on the loading screen with this text on the loading bar:

Squad/Parts/Utility/commsAntennaDTS-M1/commsAntennaDTS-M1/mediumDishAntenna

Not sure what to do to fix it. I've tried removing some mods but got nothing to work.

 

Mods:

KSP: 1.2 (Win64) - Unity: 5.4.0p4 - OS: Windows 8.1  (6.3.0) 64bit
Filter Extensions - 2.7.2
Community Resource Pack - 0.6.1
Firespitter - 7.4.1
Interstellar Fuel Switch - 2.2.4
Kerbal Attachment System - 0.6
KerbalAtomics - 0.2.6
HyperEdit - 1.5.3
Kerbal Inventory System - 1.3
KSP-AVC Plugin - 1.1.6.2
NearFuturePropulsion - 0.7.4
NearFutureSolar - 0.6.2
NearFutureSpacecraft - 0.5.1
RCS Sounds - 5.0
RealChute - 1.4.1.2
SCANsat - 1.1.6.9
SSTULabs - 0.5.32.125
Trajectories - 1.6.3
Kerbal Alarm Clock - 3.8
TweakScale - 2.3
KSP Interstellar Extended - 1.10.8
I have the exact same problem

You are running a few mods that are not updated for 1.2 yet.  You need to remove those.

If you are continuing a save any ships with removed mod parts will not load.

if you bought this game off steam right click kerbal space program in library, then properties, then a window comes up, click local files and then click verify integrity of game cache, this should fix the problem, as well as any other problems you have, and it might even re-add some parts back into the game that are stock.
